Song.title: O Come, O Come, Emmanuel (with Latin Verse)
Song.copyright: Words by John Neale and Henery Coffin Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Latin: Ve[Em]ni, [D6/F#]ven[G]i Em[Am D6]man[D]u[G]el; [D/F#]Capt[Em]ivum [C]solve [Am Bm]Isra[Em]el, Qui [Am]gemit in [Bm]ex[C]il[D]i[Bm]o, Priv[Em]at[D6/F#]us [G]Dei [Am D6]Fil[D]i[G]o. Gaud[D]e! Gaud[Em]e! Em[Am D6]man[D]u[G]el, [D/F#]Nas[Em]cetur p[C]ro te, [Am Bm]Isra[Em]el!
VERSE 1: O [Em]come, [D6/F#]O [G]come, Em[Am D6]man[D]u[G]el, [D/F#]And [Em]ransom [C]captive [Am Bm]Isra[Em]el That [Am]mourns in lone[Bm]ly [C]e-[D]xile [Bm]here, Un[Em]til [D6/F#]the [G]Son of [Am D6]G[D]od ap[G]pear Re[D]joice! Re[Em]joice! Em[Am D6]man[D]u[G]el [D/F#]shall [Em]come to [C]thee, O [Am Bm]Isra[Em]el
VERSE 2: O [Em]come [D6/F#]Thou [G]Rod of [Am D6]Je[D]-sse [G]free, [D/F#]Thine [Em]own from [C]Satan's [Am Bm]ty-ra-n[Em]ny From [Am]depths of hell [Bm]Thy [C]pe[D]-ople [Bm]save, And [Em]give [D6/F#]them [G]victory [Am D6]o'[D]er the [G]grave Re[D]joice! Re[Em]joice! Em[Am D6]man[D]u[G]el [D/F#]shall [Em]come to [C]thee, O [Am Bm]Isra[Em]el
{new_page} VERSE 3: O[Em] come, [D6/F#]Thou [G]Dayspring, [Am D6]co[D]-me and [G]cheer, [D/F#]Our [Em]spirits [C]by Thine [Am Bm]a-dvent [Em]here And [Am]drive away [Bm]the [C]sha[D]-des of [Bm]night, And [Em]pierce [D6/F#]the [G]clouds and [Am D6]bri[D]-ng us [G]light Re[D]joice! Re[Em]joice! Em[Am D6]man[D]u[G]el [D/F#]shall [Em]come to [C]thee, O [Am Bm]Isra[Em]el
VERSE 4: O [Em]come, [D6/F#]Thou [G]Key of [Am D6]Da[D]-vid, [G]come, [D/F#]And [Em]open [C]wide our [Am Bm]hea-venly [Em]home Make [Am]safe the way [Bm]that [C]le[D]-ads on [Bm]high, And [Em]close [D6/F#]the [G]path of [Am D6]mi[D]-ser[G]y Re[D]joice! Re[Em]joice! Em[Am D6]man[D]u[G]el [D/F#]shall [Em]come to [C]thee, O [Am Bm]Isra[Em]el
Arrangement.searchtext: latin veni veni emmanuel captivum solve israel qui gemit in exilio privatus dei filio gaude gaude emmanuel nascetur pro te israel verse 1 o come o come emmanuel and ransom captive israel that mourns in lonely exile here until the son of god appear rejoice rejoice emmanuel shall come to thee o israel verse 2 o come thou rod of jesse free thine own from satans tyranny from depths of hell thy people save and give them victory oer the grave rejoice rejoice emmanuel shall come to thee o israel verse 3 o come thou dayspring come and cheer our spirits by thine advent here and drive away the shades of night and pierce the clouds and bring us light rejoice rejoice emmanuel shall come to thee o israel verse 4 o come thou key of david come and open wide our heavenly home make safe the way that leads on high and close the path of misery rejoice rejoice emmanuel shall come to thee o israel

Arrangement.text:
Latin: Ve[Am]ni, veni Em[Dm]manu[Am]el; Capt[Am]ivum solve [G Em]Isra[Am]el, {key:Dm} Qui [Dm]gemit in ex[Am G]il[Am]i[Em]o, Priv[Am]atus Dei [Dm/F G6]Fili[C]o. Gaud[G]e! Gaud[Am]e! Em[Dm]manu[Am]el, Nas[Am]cetur pro te, [G Em]Isra[Am]el!
VERSE 1: O [Am]come, O come, Em[Dm]manu[Am]el, And [Am]ransom captive [G Em]Isra[Am]el That [Dm]mourns in lonely [Am G]e-[Am]xile [Em]here, Un[Am]til the Son of [Dm/F G6]God ap[C]pear Re[G]joice! Re[Am]joice! Em[Dm]manu[Am]el Shall [Am]come to thee, O [G Em]Isra[Am]el
VERSE 2: O come Thou Rod of Je-sse free, Thine own from Satan's ty-ra-nny From depths of hell Thy pe-ople save, And give them victory o'er the grave Rejoice! Rejoice! Emmanuel shall come to thee, O Israel
{new_page} VERSE 3: O come, Thou Dayspring, co-me and cheer, Our spirits by Thine a-dvent here And drive away the sha-des of night, And pierce the clouds and bri-ng us light Rejoice! Rejoice! Emmanuel shall come to thee, O Israel
VERSE 4: O come, Thou Key of Da-vid, come, And open wide our hea-venly home Make safe the way that le-ads on high, And close the path of mi-sery Rejoice! Rejoice! Emmanuel shall come to thee, O Israel
Arrangement.searchtext: latin veni veni emmanuel captivum solve israel qui gemit in exilio privatus dei filio gaude gaude emmanuel nascetur pro te israel verse 1 o come o come emmanuel and ransom captive israel that mourns in lonely exile here until the son of god appear rejoice rejoice emmanuel shall come to thee o israel verse 2 o come thou rod of jesse free thine own from satans tyranny from depths of hell thy people save and give them victory oer the grave rejoice rejoice emmanuel shall come to thee o israel verse 3 o come thou dayspring come and cheer our spirits by thine advent here and drive away the shades of night and pierce the clouds and bring us light rejoice rejoice emmanuel shall come to thee o israel verse 4 o come thou key of david come and open wide our heavenly home make safe the way that leads on high and close the path of misery rejoice rejoice emmanuel shall come to thee o israel

Arrangement.text: VERSE 1: O [Em]come, [D6/F#]O [G]come, Em[Am D6]man[D]u[G]el, [D/F#]And [Em]ransom [C]captive [Am Bm]Isra[Em]el That [Am]mourns in lone[Bm]ly [C]e-[D]xile [Bm]here, Un[Em]til [D6/F#]the [G]Son of [Am D6]G[D]od ap[G]pear Re[D]joice! Re[Em]joice! Em[Am D6]man[D]u[G]el [D/F#]shall [Em]come to [C]thee, O [Am Bm]Isra[Em]el
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 o come o come emmanuel and ransom captive israel that mourns in lonely exile here until the son of god appear rejoice rejoice emmanuel shall come to thee o israel
